name: Breathe in Puzzle out
description:
Lisa's having a hard time focusing on her own thoughts. Help her by guiding her focus throughout the levels of this puzzle game. Beware though, concentration is very tricky to maintain and can easily become unstable by the influence of bad thoughts or distractions.

Connect your way to collectables by placing tiles to direct the flow of the Focus Energy. When the Focus Flow becomes too complex (too many tiles placed on the board), Lisa's concentration will become unstable and you will have to remove Unstable tiles to let them stabilize themselves.

Collect all Keys to proceed to the next level :)

 We highly recommend you play the downloadable version, it runs smoother and prettier

Art by Duana Aquino
Code and Design by Gabriel Leite
